overview:
Michele has spent over 15 years helping transform companies through collaboration and communication as a marketing leader, senior consultant, program and product manager. She is an internationally experienced digital marketing executive, community builder and change agent with unparalleled practice in enterprise social business. Her success comes from the ability to energize and inspire the whole organization while creating trust and alignment between departments, up through the C-suite.

Having held in-house and agency leadership roles, she is recognized for creating innovative communication programs and directing transformation efforts that harness emerging trends. She has successfully closed and implemented large-scale projects across the Americas, Europe and AsiaPac for companies that include Toshiba, Allergan, WellPoint, Mattel, eBay, Charles Schwab, Wells Fargo, Disney and dozens of other world class brands.

She is know for exceptional problem solving and her ability to craft solutions based on process, people, structure and systems. A frequent industry speaker on a wide-range of marketing and collaboration disciplines â€“ her recent talks include: Enterprise Social Business: Why Supporting Customers is the New Marketing, What Does a Social Business Strategy Look Like and Community Building.

Michele’s expertise areas include: lead lifecycle management, demand generation strategy, enterprise collaboration, social business (enterprise 2.0) communications, branding, product marketing, demand generation and community-building.

milestones.description: Relaunched xGirl Industry as Warther Consulting.
